tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Patient_Biometric_Data (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  weight FLOAT,
  height FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE PatientBiometricData (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE BiometricRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    record_date DATE,
    heart_rate INT,
    blood_pressure VARCHAR(20),
    temperature FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES PatientBiometricData(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patient_biometrics (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR,
age INT,
height FLOAT,
weight FLOAT)

CREATE TABLE HeartRateData (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
patient_id INT,
heart_rate INT,
timestamp TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE BloodPressureData (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
patient_id INT,
systolic_pressure INT,
diastolic_pressure INT,
heart_rate INT,
timestamp TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE TemperatureData (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
patient_id INT,
temperature FLOAT,
timestamp TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE Patient ( 
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    name TEXT NOT NULL, 
    age INT NOT NULL, 
    gender TEXT, 
    height FLOAT, 
    weight FLOAT 
);

CREATE TABLE BloodPressure ( 
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    patient_id INT REFERENCES Patient(id), 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
    systolic INT NOT NULL, 
    diastolic INT NOT NULL 
);
